hasMessage.hasTextContent: Tirofiban   causes   bleeding, as can   ponatinib   ; concurrent use might increase the risk of developing this effect .  Manufacturer advises use with caution or avoid .

hasDitaContent.@value: Both ponatinib and tolfenamic acid can increase the risk of bleeding.

hasMessage.hasTextContent: Both  ponatinib  and  tolfenamic acid  can increase the risk of bleeding.

hasDitaContent.@value: Ponatinib causes bleeding, as can trametinib ; concurrent use might increase the risk of developing this effect. Manufacturer makes no recommendation.

hasMessage.hasTextContent: Ponatinib   causes   bleeding, as can   trametinib   ; concurrent use might increase the risk of developing this effect .  Manufacturer makes no recommendation .

hasDitaContent.@value: Ponatinib causes bleeding, as can trastuzumab emtansine ; concurrent use might increase the risk of developing this effect. Manufacturer advises caution.

hasDitaContent.@value: Ponatinib causes bleeding, as can volanesorsen ; concurrent use might increase the risk of developing this effect. Manufacturer advises avoid depending on platelet count—consult product literature.
